text: Your peer throws garbage outside the garbage can.
Your peer shouts in the classroom while the teacher is speaking.
Someone holds the door for you.
A peer asks to borrow a pencil and says please and thank you.
Your parents give you a present for practicing good social etiquettes all year.
I make you feel furious and strong-headed. What emotion am I?
I make you feel happy and positive. What emotion am I?
